scripts.postinstall: concurrently "npm run postinstall:server" "npm run postinstall:client" && npm run heroku-postbuild:server && npm run heroku-postbuild:client
scripts.postinstall:server: cd server && npm install && echo "[INSTALLED SERVER DEPENDENCIES]"
scripts.postinstall:client: cd client && npm install && echo "[INSTALLED CLIENT DEPENDENCIES]"
scripts.heroku-postbuild-skip: npm run heroku-postbuild:server && npm run heroku-postbuild:client
